news.tests package¶

Views Tests¶

class news.tests.testviews.TestViews(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

setUp()¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

test_create_user_with_existing_username()¶

Testing if API can handle if a new user is being created with an existing username

test_create_user_with_no_username()¶

Testing if API return a 400 Bad Request response if no username is provided to create a user

test_favourite_get_request_including_article_id()¶

Testing if a GET request is used instead of POST request to add or remove an article from favourites

test_favourite_reponse_always_in_json()¶

Testing if the API response is always in json format for “favourite/” URL

test_favourite_with_invalid_id()¶

Testing if an invalid article id is passed to add or romove from favourites. invalid means that a article does not existing with that aricle id

test_favourite_with_valid_id()¶

Testing if a valid article id is passed to add or romove from favourites. invalid means that a article does not existing with that aricle id

test_favourites_with_existing_username()¶

Testing if API returns a success response in returning a fetch favoruite query for a user

test_favourites_with_non_existing_username()¶

Testing if fetch favourites request is handled by the API if a username is mentioned but a user is not created by that username

test_favourites_without_username()¶

Testing if fetch favourites request is handled by the API if a username is not mentioned.

test_get_request_to_create_user()¶

Testing if API return a 404 Not Found response if GET request instead of POST

test_if_repeated_query_fetched_from_db()¶

Testing if a repeated query is fetched from existing database instead of making a new request. it is proved if the time stamp of first and repeated query is same.

test_news_reponse_always_in_json()¶

Testing if the API response is always in json format for “news/” URL

test_news_with_keyword()¶

Testing if API return a 200 OK response if a keyword is provided

test_news_without_keyword()¶

Testing if API return a 200 OK response if no keyword is provided

test_repeated_query_after_expiry()¶

Testing if query is repeated but after expiry time, the API makes a new request to thiedparty news APIs instead of fetching old query results from the database.

To do this a dummy time is created tby subtracting expiry time(120s) from current time and a query is posted with dummy time. and if the time stamp on repeated query result and dummy time are differnet it means a new request is sent.

class news.tests.testurls.TestUrls(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.SimpleTestCase

test_process_query_url_resolves()¶

Testing if the ‘create/’ url resolves and returns the create_user function from views
